NorthSouth.text: NorthSouth is called West by some, others call it East, they can't really agree on a name though.

North.text: This one is called north, it has many northern facts.

South.text: opposite direction of North, but not a bad place.

Basic.text: It once was a ball, it started as one, but then, one day, in the future, a new past; it grew, with the help of meteors and lava, and from there.
